hero.title: Preserving the Taste of
hero.description: Explore the richness of Indonesian cuisine from Sabang to Merauke. Discover authentic recipes, share stories, and join the community of Indonesian culinary enthusiasts.

features.title: Featured Services
features.description: Everything you need to explore and share the richness of Indonesian cuisine

search.title: Food Search
search.description: Search for traditional dishes by province or name. Find thousands of authentic recipes from across Indonesia.

ai.title: AI Recommendations
ai.description: AI chatbot that helps you find food according to your taste, available ingredients, or special occasions.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join a community of culinary enthusiasts. Share recipes, cooking tips, and your culinary stories.

blog.title: Recipes & Blog
blog.description: Upload and share your favorite recipes. Write blogs about culinary adventures and stories behind the dishes.

provinces.title: 34 Provinces
provinces.description: Explore cuisine from 34 Indonesian provinces. From Aceh to Papua, everything in one place.

authentic.title: Authentic Recipes
authentic.description: Recipes that maintain their authenticity. From traditional heritage recipes to modern innovations that stay authentic.

cta.title: Ready to Join the Community?
cta.description: Thousands of Indonesian culinary enthusiasts have joined. Share recipes, find your favorite foods, and preserve the taste of Indonesia with us.

home.title: Home
